algorithm_technique: Counting even numbers in the input list
problem_summary_simple: Determine if any two numbers in a list, when OR-ed, result in a number with trailing zeros.
problem_summary_technical: Checks if at least two numbers in the list are even, as their bitwise OR will have a trailing zero.
key_insights: A number has trailing zeros in binary if and only if it is even.
The bitwise OR of two numbers will be even if at least one of the numbers is even.
Therefore, we only need to find if there are at least two even numbers in the input array.
